markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Protean](/Traits.aspx?ID=231)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 347</row>

A family of monitors spawned within the [Maelstrom](/Planes.aspx?ID=19), these creatures are guardians of disorder and are chaotic neutral. They typically have darkvision, an amorphous anatomy, and a weakness to lawful damage.
name: Protean
